```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(bio3d)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message = FALSE}
ids <- c("1TND_B","1AGR_A","1TAG_A","1GG2_A","1KJY_A","4G5Q_A")  

files <- get.pdb(ids, split = TRUE)

pdbs <- pdbaln(files, fit = TRUE)

```


```{r}
print(pdbs)
```
